The Cycle:

Breaking Stigmas & Unlocking the Benefits of the Female Reproductive System with the Sympto-thermal Method of Fertility Awareness

The following excerpts from Jennifer Aldoretta's book will teach you the details of practicing the sympto-thermal method of fertility awareness for the purposes of natural birth control, pregnancy assistance, and maintenance of reproductive health. The rest of the book can be read or downloaded for free in its entirety.
